title: Account Manager, Branding Acceleration (English, Japanese)
description: Businesses that partner with Google come in all shapes, sizes and market caps, and no one Google advertising solution works for all. Your knowledge of online media combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities shapes how new and existing businesses grow. Using your relationship-building skills, you provide Google-caliber client service, research and market analysis. You anticipate how decisions are made, persistently explore and uncover the business needs of Google's key clients and understand how our range of product offerings can grow their business. Working with them, you set the vision and the strategy for how their advertising can reach thousands of users.
key_qualifications: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience. 2 years of experience in advertising, consultative sales, business development, online media environment, or marketing role. Ability to communicate in English and Japanese fluently in order to interact with internal and external stakeholders.
preferred_qualifications: Experience in online ad sales, business development, marketing, or consulting sales. Experience in Google Ads account management. Excellent investigative and problem-solving skills. Excellent leadership, organization, communication, people management, and teamwork skills.
responsibilities: Develop and manage relationships with top advertisers in Japan and multitask in a fast-paced environment. Lead digital transformation in large Ad spenders with high-potential in Large Customer Sales (LCS). Grow existing business, develop new business with global and domestic clients, and support the team with account and market knowledge and other collateral.
